title: Software Developer
subtitle: BBC
description: I currently work as a full stack Software Developer, using Typescript to present, ingest and call Audience data on a NextJS websites for our stakeholders to use. My role involves working daily with with AWS services, SQL (Postgres), JS/TS, APIs, NextJS and providing suitable suggestions for further optimisation of the site.

title: Software Developer
subtitle: Connect Health
description: I worked as a full stack Junior Developer, using React and JavaScript to build frontend websites and interfaces that are accessible to all patients. Manage NodeJS/ ExpressJS and .NET APIs which requires interaction with an SQL Server data warehouse where I develop SQL procedures and queries to process, transform, and manage data. In addition to new development, I also maintain, refactor, and upgrade existing systems.

title: Graduated Abertay University
subtitle: Computing - Bachelor of Science
description: Whilst attending Abertay University I participated in the Computing Society as well as the Basketball 1st team. I left Abertay with a 1st Class BSc Honours Degree in Computing and a 4.3 out of 4.5 GPA. Additionally university allowed me to develop a range of soft skills such as independence, intuition, and ability to self teach.

title: Bartender & Waiter
subtitle: Apex Hotels
description: As a Bartender and Waiter I was required to serve and clean the tables at the Apex Hotels. The experience allowed me to develop good communication skills and management of both work and time.

title: Chef
subtitle: Pacamara Food & Drink
description: Working as a chef I developed time management and further teamwork which required communication and trust in for the food to be prepared correctly.

title: Graduated Gateshead College
subtitle: Software Development - BTEC Extended Diploma
description: I graduated with a highest level (D*D*D*) BTEC Extended Diploma in Software Development. I was involved in a variety of projects, including a range of web, mobile, and desktop development. I developed a range of soft skills such as independence, intuition, and ability to self teach.

title: Chef & Waiter
subtitle: Cairn Hotel Group
description: As my first job, I built up my work ethic and determination for progression, where after a year I moved from a waiter to a chef and began specialise in being a Pizza chef at an italian restaurant

title: Graduated Lord Lawson Academy
subtitle: GCSEs
description: I completed my GCSEs with 9 General Certificates of Secondary Education: A to C.

title: Head Basketball Coach
subtitle: Gateshead/ Birtley Phoenix
description: As a head coach I was required to manage the team and provide coaching to the players. This role built up leadership skills within a team orientated environment
